track.name: The Rain
comments: Hearing her song make me relaxed, thank you!
To breathe in this beautiful song
what  a perfect song for reminiscing and  nostalgia  on  them rainy  days
rainy night in New York and you walk into a jazz club, hairs all soaked, hearing this song.

Was the rain in Spain? Or did Adele set fire to the rain, amongst others. Or were people singing and dancing in the rain, apart from Gene Kelly. Or just walking in the rain? We need to know.......... dancing naked in the rain, on a deserted beach on a Greek island, on a hot day with the one one loves is great.
I think that thinking indepently is the one for me(1)
I think jazz is the one for me <3
why does my heart feel so
